FuncDef: The command configures the allocation/retention priority to be used in the GTP messages as QOS IE (for a Gn interface) or Bearer QOS (for GTPv2).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the Allocation/Retention Priority (ARP). Values-1 to 3 (for ggsn context).

ExtraInfo: Default: no ambr		  		- for ggsnambr down-link 20000 up-link 10000  - for mme and pgw 1
